Detailed Description

Provides functions for not null constraint

Function Documentation

Function that checks if constraint name is unique and in violation of NOT NULL constraint.

Author

Parameters

Returns

Function for deleting specific not null constraint.

Author
Maja Vračan
Parameters
tableNamename of table on which constraint refers
attNamename of attribute on which constraint is declared

Returns
EXIT_SUCCESS when constraint is deleted, else EXIT_ERROR
